title: Trombone Champ gets truly nasty, adds the hellish Flight of the Bumblebee
description: But it also gets nice by adding a 'Practice Mode' that lets you play songs at half speed.

title: Star Trek: Resurgence is now set to arrive in May
description: The big Trek adventure from former Telltale developers won't quite make its April release target, but it's coming soon.

title: Former World of Warcraft lead developer hints at something big coming to Classic
description: Is World of Warcraft Classic Plus finally happening?

title: Honkai: Star Rail unlock times and release date
description: Here's when Hoyoverse's next game Honkai: Star Rail unlocks globally on release day.

title: We talked to the Emulati gearing up to make Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom playable on PC next month
description: How long will it take the Switch exclusive to run in emulators Yuzu and Ryujinx? We asked the experts.

title: FTX collapse has done lethal damage to an up-and-coming card game
description: Storybook Brawl says there's "no path forward," and so it's closing next week.

title: Hideo Kojima laments that Metal Gear Solid 4's digital battlefield 'is no longer science fiction'
description: "A future where parties do not fight, but are represented by drones, proxy soldiers and corporations."

title: Stranded: Alien Dawn
description: Build and defend a colony on a hostile alien planet.

title: Asus has been building the ROG Ally for 5 years and here are the hideous prototypes to prove it
description: The ROG Ally would have been released whether the Steam Deck existed or not... just probably not quite so soon.

title: The most ambitious and flawed Total War has just received its first update in years
description: Time to take Empire for another spin?

title: Metacritic promises stricter moderation to tackle 'abusive and disrespectful' user reviews
description: Changes are expected in the coming months following a homophobic review-bombing campaign.

title: The Witcher season 3 teaser video reveals June debut date and two-part release schedule
description: The first proper teaser for Henry Cavill's final season as Geralt paints a grim picture of the future.

title: This massive mod voice acts all of Hollow Knight, even the item descriptions
description: Over a hundred fans came together to create Hallownest Vocalized.

title: NetEase is not suing Blizzard—The Chinese court system confused one angry man with a corporate behemoth
description: Yesterday's reports that Blizzard was suing NetEase were erroneous.

title: Nier: Automata has sold 7.5 million copies and there's still no sign of a sequel
description: Creator Yoko Taro jokes that "he'd do anything for money"... but it seems he won't do that.

title: The ROG Ally doesn't need the Deck's Verified system because of Windows and its AMD Z1 chip
description: Asus says AMD's Z1 silicon and Windows 11 will be all the verification you need that your games will just work on the ROG Ally.

title: Asus ROG Ally launches May 11 with pricing 'for sure... below $1,000'
description: Asus' Steam Deck rival is promising to redefine handheld gaming.

title: Dead Island 2's development hell has paid off with 1M launch weekend sales
description: A lotta zombie slayers hit up Hell-A this past weekend.

title: Epic's antitrust case against Apple looks dead in the water
description: The latest ruling by an appeals court may well seal the deal.

title: EA asks leakers to please knock it off with the Jedi: Survivor spoilers
description: "A lot of people will be upset to see spoilers before they get to play, and for us it's really disheartening to see as well," said a writer at Respawn.

title: Memory overclocking being blamed for AMD Ryzen chips burning themselves to death
description: Asus has released a statement citing EXPO memory profiles and SoC voltage as linked to overheating issues.

title: Diablo 4's full version wants twice as much storage as the beta
description: You can play D4 on almost anything, but its highest settings demand the bleeding edge.

description: Trouble solving today's Wordle? Here's the help you need.
